question: Now I'm going to read a list of political leaders.  For each, tell me how much confidence you have in each leader to do the right thing regarding world affairs - a lot of confidence, some confidence, not too much confidence, or no confidence at all?...Saudi King Abdullah
raw_output:
My confidence in King Abdullah regarding his actions on world affairs is moderate because, during his reign, he has shown efforts towards reform and regional stability, but he has also maintained certain traditional policies that sometimes limit his influence on global issues. Therefore, I would say some confidence.

ANSWER: B
